title: gendyn~
description: The `gendyn~` object implements Dynamic Stochastic Synthesis, generating waveforms where each point's amplitude and frequency evolve via a random walk. Users can control parameters such as the number of waveform points, frequency range, step sizes, and the statistical distributions governing these random changes. This allows for a wide spectrum of sounds, from bright tones to noise, by manipulating interpolation and random walk characteristics.
